desc: Your companion will guard an area, making a noise if someone they don't recognise enters.
name: Guard

desc: Your companion will attack a target you specify.  Once given the attack command, your companion will continue attacking until there are no combatants remaining.
name: Attack

desc: Your companion will attempt to fetch an unguarded item.
name: Fetch

desc: Your companion will travel up to 10 minutes from you to see if there is any movement.  You can instruct them to either return and alert you, or alert when they see something.
name: Scout

desc: If you show or let your companion smell something, they can search for more within 5 minutes travel of you.  Roll a Search Move using their Mental Bonus.
name: Find

desc: Your companion moves its speed again.
name: Sprint

desc: Your companion finds one of your allies within 10 minutes of you and makes a noise.  You can impart information based on this noise if you've agreed on it beforehand.
name: Message

desc: Your companion uses their Special Attack.
name: Special Attack

desc: If doing a task that is not dangerous, your companion can reduce the time by 15%
name: Aide

desc: Your companion uses their Attack Move, and may move both before and after the attack.
name: Rush

desc: Your companion delivers an item to a companion, or to an obvious location of your choice.
name: Deliver

desc: If nearby, and if strong enough, your companion increases your Speed by 1 square, or your Jump distance and Climb Speed by 3 squares.
name: Springboard

desc: Your companion takes a Basic or Quick Attack that was not targeting them, from an enemy within range.
name: Defend

desc: Your companion can deliver a spell with a range of Touch to an opponent.
name: Bond

desc: A lithe animal, such as a cat or a stoat.
name: Lithe Animal
stats: Strength: 0, Dexterity: 3, Constitution: 1, Intelligence: 0, Wisdom: 0, Charisma: 0. Move 4sq. Verve: 20.

desc: A flying animal, such as an eagle or a bat.
name: Flying Animal
stats: Strength: 0, Dexterity: 3, Constitution: 1, Intelligence: 0, Wisdom: 0, Charisma: 0.  Move 5sq.  Verve: 20.
